Sentencas: In this study, the effects of Cu additions and external doping with CeO2 on the oxidation of nickel were evaluated.
Titulo: The effect of minor elements on the growth and electrical properties of NiO on Ni

Sentencas: The materials studied were pure Ni, Ni-5 wt.% Cu, and Ni with the surface doped with CeO2 by pulsed laser deposition (PLD).
Titulo: The effect of minor elements on the growth and electrical properties of NiO on Ni

Sentencas: The oxidation kinetics were measured using thermogravimetric analysis (TGA).
Titulo: The effect of minor elements on the growth and electrical properties of NiO on Ni

Sentencas: The oxidation microstructures were observed by scanning electron microscopy (SEM) with energy dispersive X-ray analysis (EDS).
Titulo: The effect of minor elements on the growth and electrical properties of NiO on Ni

Sentencas: A 4-point probe was used to measure the area-specific resistance (ASR) of the NiO scales.
Titulo: The effect of minor elements on the growth and electrical properties of NiO on Ni

Sentencas: The Cu additions had a negligible effect on the oxidation kinetics but Cu was found to be present in the outer portions of the scale in significant concentrations.
Titulo: The effect of minor elements on the growth and electrical properties of NiO on Ni

Sentencas: Doping with CeO2 resulted in a significant decrease in the NiO growth rate.
Titulo: The effect of minor elements on the growth and electrical properties of NiO on Ni

Sentencas: The scales on doped Ni grew primarily inward whereas those on the undoped Ni grew primarily outward.
Titulo: The effect of minor elements on the growth and electrical properties of NiO on Ni

Sentencas: Deposition of the CeO2 dopant onto Ni with a thin, preformed NiO layer produced a similar reduction in the subsequent NiO growth rate.
Titulo: The effect of minor elements on the growth and electrical properties of NiO on Ni

Sentencas: This suggests that the poisoned interface model, proposed by Pieraggi and Rapp, does not describe the effect of the CeO2 dopant.
Titulo: The effect of minor elements on the growth and electrical properties of NiO on Ni

Sentencas: The ASR values decreased commensurate with the scale thicknesses indicating that there was insignificant doping of Ce+4 ions onto the Ni sublattice in the scales.
Titulo: The effect of minor elements on the growth and electrical properties of NiO on Ni

Sentencas: Mechanisms are presented to attempt to describe the above observations and a theoretical model for calculating ASR is presented.
Titulo: The effect of minor elements on the growth and electrical properties of NiO on Ni
